headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SLATER, SELMA TERNER

snippet: SLATER--Selma Terner. Forever Young. Beloved mother of Michael and Richard Weber, predeceased by her parents Ida and Louis Terner, sister of the late Emanuel, Sylvia, Beatrice, William, and widow of Louis Slater. A cherished aunt and grand aunt an...
lead_paragraph: SLATER--Selma Terner. Forever Young. Beloved mother of Michael and Richard Weber, predeceased by her parents Ida and Louis Terner, sister of the late Emanuel, Sylvia, Beatrice, William, and widow of Louis Slater. A cherished aunt and grand aunt and a generous philanthropist to charities and causes both large and small, in New York City and Palm Beach. Graveside Service will be held on Friday, July 8, 10:30am at Beth David Cemetery Elmont, NY for further information please call Frank E. Campbell "The Funeral Chapel" at 212-288-3500. 1/3
